phrases: Hey all you viewers out there!
When you are watching Fairy Tail keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen, all right?
Reitei Lyon is Gray's former fellow pupil and is plotting to resurrect Deliora!
And it was their master, Ul, who sealed it using a spell that turns your own body into ice, Iced She Will!
You are the one who killed Ul!
Do we live together or die together?
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
This excitement gets my heart racing
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Living itself will be our training!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
We will do our best living our life
You do not have the guts to die!
Natsu, Erza, everyone at Fairy Tail...
It is up to you now...
Sorry, but I am making my exit!
You break into my fight spouting responsibility?
Do not be takin' my kill!
I am the one that is going to beat him!
Did not I tell you that I would take him down?
And did I ever say, Yes, Roger that, Sir?
I have to be the one that finishes him off!
Since when is dying finishing a battle?
Are not that just running away, huh?!
We must not allow anyone to get in the way of Reitei-sama!
Now the light of the moon will land on Deliora again!
The moon will be out soon, so I returned the temple to normal.
After all my hard work tilting it!
How did you fix it back up?
How did you fix it back up!
I suppose we should begin the Moon Drip ceremony.
I am going to wallop that bastard a million times.
You lost last time, and it is a disgrace.
Did you count on Natsu stopping me from using Iced She Will?
I would not imagine that guy getting anywhere near that kind of magic.
So you just planned on taking it?
But I would have been saved.
Once I realized that, I said Do it.
Even if I were to be trapped in the ice, I have allies with the same goals as myself.
And this is the island where you can use the Moon Drip to undo Iced She Will.
Iced She Will is powerless here, is not it?
And yet you still wish to defeat me?
First you threaten, and then you persuade?
Does your guild have some dentist that de-fangs you all?
Iced She Will was a spell that turned her body into ice.
The very same ice that you are trying to melt now... is Ul herself!
Ul became that ice and lives on today!
I apologize for not telling you before.
I promised Ul that I would not.
If he knew that I became the ice, he would probably spend his entire life trying to undo the spell.
But that ice is no longer Ul.
It is just some frozen remains!
You honestly believe that Ul is still alive?
How can you move with such a wound?
I have had enough of trying to save you!
So you will attempt to defeat me, the elder pupil?
I have been holding back for my battle with Deliora.
I do not want to waste my magic power, see.
We will settle it this way.
Aim for your opponent's weak points when fighting.
Do not you dare speak that name!
Hold it right there, you masked-bastard!
How did you fix the ruins?!
You think that would work on me?
As you can see, that is how I returned the ruins back how they were.
What kind of magic was that?
Magic so powerful and with such grave side-effects that they have been erased from history itself.
You were going to finish it with your fists, remember?
There was a guy I fought like this before...
You are the one that should stand up!
In the end, you were no match for me.
You should have died a long time ago!
Not while I have not shown him I am the best!
I am not going to lose!
I am not going to lose!
I cannot stand... losing to you!
But that sky was so blue it got on my nerves...
There may be a lot of them, but their magical power is weak.
They only have 5 real wizards among them.
I cannot get serious with these guys.
Gate of the Giant Crab, I open thee!
Erza, my lady, for what might I have this pleasure-snip?
And I am the one who summoned you!
Anyway, make them all powerless to fight!
Me being brought to my knees by someone like Gray?
No one will be able to stop me!
We are going to stop you!
Even when Zalty has started the Moon Drip?
You guys cannot even hold a candle to that jerk.
Let us start by burning you to a crisp!
Those are some fine fighting words.
How did you know I was here?
I have got a good nose.
And you smell like women's perfume for some reason...
You see, I must ensure Deliora is resurrected no matter what.
It is not going to happen.
Gray will blow that guy away, and I will blow you away.
Who is above doing the ceremony?
With just a single person the moon drip effect is quite weak...
But we have already gathered plenty of moonlight.
Just a tiny bit more, and...
The ice is melting off Deliora!
I have to do something about the guy on top!
I will not let you escape.
Chasing after me was a mistake, you see.
We cannot let you interfere with Reitei-sama!
You are the citizens of Brago, are not you?
If you use fire magic here, it will accelerate the ice melting off Deliora!
If you could use fire magic to melt the ice, then you would not have had to go through all this trouble!
It will be fastest to beat you here, then smash the guy up on top.
I am surprised at how quickly you can think on your feet in the midst of a battle.
The Moon Drip ceremony has begun.
The ice has started melting off Deliora.
You were not able to stop me.
Do you have any idea how long I have waited for this moment?
I spent ten years gathering allies, knowledge, then I finally learned of this island.
The island where you can gather the light of the moon, Galuna!
You have been doing this pointless crap for three years?
That is rich, coming from someone who is been playing around in some guild for ten years!
I just trusted what Ul told me!
There are a ton of wizards stronger than me in the countries to the west.
And I finally arrived at Fairy Tail...
There were a ton of amazing wizards.
Iced She Will is a magic that is done by one's own will.
No magic done by a third-party has the power to melt the ice.
But there are a ton of amazing wizards here, right?
Well, there may be one way, though...
Melting the ice would be no different than killing Ul.
When I think back on it, I realize that gramps was going to mention the Moon Drip, I bet.
And to think that it would be her own pupil that is trying to kill Ul!
I have lived my entire life for this day.
How can a pupil surpass his teacher when she is already dead!
If I can destroy the one thing that defeated our teacher, then I can surpass her!
That ambition of yours is nice, but you have not realized you have taken a wrong turn along the way!
You think someone as blind as you could beat Ul?
This is what you are, Lyon.
A caged beast who knows nothing of the world.
I will destroy that Creation Magic of yours!
Creations made with one hand are out of balance.
So when it counts they do not have the power.
I should have braced it before...
What the heck is that sound?
I have got no choice then...
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
Today we will be telling you the secrets of Erza, the Armored Wizard!
Called Titania, Erza fights by requiping different weapons and magic armor one after another.
She has some swimsuits and other weird clothes, but she is really strong!
Still she has times when she does not listen to people.
Natsu, you ate the fish I was planning on having, did not you?
I will give you the next one I catch, okay?
It is too bad, I was hoping to take you fishing with me, but...
Wait, did not you just say our friendship was over?
A cat's short term memory is very poor.
That is sure convenient for you...
